title: Drawing, "Drawings. Landscape sketches, Jamaica, West Indies", July 1865
medium: Graphite on cream-colored heavy wove paper
markings: Stamped in ink, at center left: Lugt 457c
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in a grove, at center:  yams / fern; again,at lower right: bamboo; and at bottom right:  Jamaica  July - 1865 -
description: Horizontal view showing a wooded vale obliquely drawn and stretching toward the right, mountain ranges in the distance, and a plant with big leaves at bottom left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawings. Landscape sketches, Jamaica, West Indies", July 1865.
July 1865. Graphite on cream-colored heavy wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-12-a.
